bibl.title: Burial Customs in Ancient Egypt. Life in Death for Rich and Poor.
bibl.note: The tenth chapter covers Egypt under the Ptolemies, and the eleventh and final chapter gives a brief overview of Roman Egypt.
bibl.seg: GRAJETZKI Wolfram, Burial Customs in Ancient Egypt. Life in Death for Rich and Poor.
The tenth chapter covers Egypt under the Ptolemies, and the eleventh and final chapter gives a brief overview of Roman Egypt.
C.R. par Salima Ikram, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/2004/2004-01-10.html >. - Robert Schiestl, OLZ 100 (2005) coll. 241-246.
